DOC.criteria: give voluntary consent participate study function graft longer 3 month 10 year clinical cardiovascular disease 6 month precede entry stable graft function glomerular filtration rate > 30 ml/min/1.73 m2 , creatinine concentration < 2.5 mg/dl medical staff ( medical doctor , nurse ) meet criteria episode illness ( example : infection ) pregnancy
